article_title: U.S. nurse Nina Pham, who had Ebola, is virus free
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: us, nurse, nina, pham, who, had, ebola, virus, free, health, officials

og.description: Dallas nurse Nina Pham is now Ebola-free and will be discharged from the National Institutes of Health Friday.
og.title: 1st Nurse To Contract Ebola In US Is Now Virus-Free
